content:
Indulge in our new Tiffin & Tea service featuring a selection of small bites with Indian & Taj flair and homemade sweets.

Be entertained by shows featuring the brightest stars from the worlds of Broadway and Jazz. Learn more about our upcoming performances here.

Take in Two E's new art series, now featuring the vibrant works of Jasmina Danowski through February 17, 2019.

Explore Two E's elegant interior with a 360-degree virtual tour.
